description:
<p>The SUN (Service User Network) project is an open-access crisis therapeutic community in the community. It provides support and crisis planning for people with or without a primary mental health diagnosis though SUN groups. The groups help service users to feel less excluded and more empowered as coping strategies are shared between SUN members leading to fewer crises. The service links in with the wider Enhanced Crisis Pathway in the borough as and when necessary The SUN Manager will promote a team culture based on therapeutic community principles. Active lived experience in the ongoing development of the service is also key to delivering a service that meets the needs of the local community. The SUN Manager will work as an integral part of the leadership team for Crisis Services in City & Hackney. The post holder will ensure that the SUN (Service User Network) offers patient centred care with good clinical governance as well as engaging in ongoing service development to meet the needs of the local population.</p>
<p> </p>
